TopicTitle: are you interested on a tutorial on shuttle ?

Articles.Content:
I wanted to know if there is people who are wondering how to make a shuttle and more importantly how to balance it

I can make a video on how i made mine but i want to know if it's usefull to this community !!

Let me know

it will be a 15 min video with a speed built of one of my shuttles ( not release one ) and some tips to take off and succed on a first orbit shuttle style !!

If this poll die i won't make my vid

ps: not a treat just a way to see if spend some time on this

cheers !

As I've just posted in another tutorial thread - videos are pretty useless to those of us who don't have unlimited broadband. Please write about the most important details.

Also - how are you defining "shuttle"? Is it a reusable space-plane or specifically a copy of that United States thingy?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

this is the last one i builted made with b9, and space shuttle engine and ksp 23.5 for the "magnifique" boosters
I'd be interested if it's done with stock parts, not so much if it's done with mods though.

I play with FAR and i can't make a proper shuttle with the stock part, ( i maybe could but my computer can't handle a stock cargo bay with over 100 parts or stuff like that) plus the shuttle part of b9 are awesome !!

also use plugins to help during the build ( rcs aid for the torque made by the engine and void for the dV)

The main topic is just how to balance the shuttle and how to place the engine so it will apply on a stock shuttle. I've made some shuttle without the super gimbal engine to really understand the best way to keep the CoM more or less at the same place. But the last one I've built is nice to fly and faster to built than the other ones of open-work ind.
